title1.title: Wiikend Sports (Loop Me!)
title1.description: Inspired by the cheerful and catchy themes of Nintendo sports games, especially Wii Sports. Composed as an infinite loop, this track uses typical elements of the genre: calm drums, a piano melody, a marimba, and the iconic "dooh" voices found in many Nintendo titles!

title2.title: Cheap Cheep Beach
title2.description: A sunny beach atmosphere with Latin percussion. This song is composed of a Part A and a Part B, with the B section featuring a small solo.

title3.title: Connecting (Loop Me!)
title3.description: Evokes the sound of menus and connection screens from the early 2000s. A Frutiger Aero-style composition, with sound effects that particularly recall the long loading times on old consoles!

title4.title: Shop (Loop Me!)
title4.description: A classic shop theme, perfect for virtual shopping. The instrumentation and composition are inspired by the Wii eShop theme!

title5.title: Harvest
title5.description: A pop-oriented composition, a bit distant from Animal Crossing, but evoking a summer evening vibe. The main guitar and organic drums set a natural tone. The melody is completed by a heavily reverberated pluck, creating the track's warm atmosphere.

title6.title: Woods Of Wonder
title6.description: This composition is reminiscent of the magical universe of Zelda games. The slightly mysterious and cheerful melody is composed of an enchanting bassline, with added elements like synths and pads. It feels like exploring a forest in Hyrule!

title7.title: Spotimon (Night version)
title7.description: Une composition pop inspirée des récents jeux Pokémon, mais avec une touche qui la rapproche des thèmes d'animé japonais. L'instrumentation organique évoque une scène romantique de fin d'épisode ou une nuit tranquille au bord d'un lac. Finalement, elle aurait toute sa place dans une série animée Pokémon !

title8.title: Internet Browser
title8.description: A Frutiger Aero composition with a neo-soul piano. As the track progresses, the organic feel of the instruments transforms into a digital sound, with various synths replacing the piano!

title9.title: Racing
title9.description: How many PS1, PS2, and other games from that era use DnB tracks, especially for racing games? A true old-school game must include this kind of music at least once in its OST. Inspired by Ridge Racer and others, this track is a tribute to vintage racing games.

title10.title: Kart 1
title10.description: My interpretation of Wii's Rainbow Road. All the elements of the Mario Kart Wii soundtrack are here: a bassline similar to the menu, the piano as the main melody, and synths, brass, and guitar to spice up the composition. The track also includes the race start fanfare, the sound of the engine revving before the start, the lap sounds, the accelerated music on the final lap, and the final ranking music!

title11.title: Kong (Loop Me!)
title11.description: As a big fan of Donkey Kong games and David Wise, this tribute was essential. Using the same instruments and music libraries as D. Wise, particularly those from Donkey Kong Country Returns and Tropical Freeze, this track has a more cheerful, calypso-style atmosphere than the original OST. It fits the image well and pays homage while adding a personal touch! You can easily imagine playing as DK on a tropical beach.

title12.title: Spotimon (Jade Version)
title12.description: Pokémon games, especially the 3rd and 4th generations, are a cherished childhood memory. To pay tribute to the 4th generation, I composed a Latin-style track that closely resembles the music from that era. I used almost the same instruments as the game to give the composition that original Nintendo DS feel. Many instruments "converse" with each other, which is typical of Pokémon city themes like Jubilife City! This track is sunnier, and you can imagine it as an alternative theme for Sunyshore City. Following the Pokémon tradition, I also created a modern remake, titled "Spotimon (Radiant Jade Version)".

title13.title: Spotimon (Radiant Jade Version)
title13.description: This is the modernized, remastered version of "Spotimon (Jade Version)," featuring more realistic instruments compared to the original DS soundfonts! You can easily imagine this remake on the Switch.

title14.title: Space Racer 2000
title14.description: A typical DnB track from the PS1/PS2 racing game era. The synth-heavy main melody makes it feel more like a futuristic game than a classic racing title. The strong and frantic percussion rhythm is ideal for a space racing game! The track's spacey, floating feel is conveyed through heavily reverberated and ethereal pads.

title15.title: Spooky Mansion
title15.description: A track designed to evoke a mysterious and slightly eerie atmosphere, perfect for a haunted mansion or a spooky level in a video game.

title16.title: Kart World (Loop Me!)
title16.description: A DnB track created with organic instruments, serving as a transition between older racing games that used DnB and recent titles with live instrumentation, like Mario Kart 8 and World, which were recorded with tons of musicians! This song is also designed as an infinite loop with different parts and has a distinct jazz-fusion feel, inspired by Mario Kart and other artists.

title17.title: Super Mmg Bros (Underwater)
title17.description: Waltzes are a popular choice for underwater themes in Nintendo games, especially in Mario and Pokémon titles. This waltz pays homage to all those underwater themes, particularly the ones from Mario on the Wii. To enhance immersion, wave sounds have been added! The composition is an infinite loop with two parts that flow seamlessly into each other.

title18.title: La Rencontre
title18.description: A track with a jazzy, mysterious, and cinematic feel, setting a calm and chilling atmosphere.

title19.title: Redrum
title19.description: A jazz-infused cinematic piece that creates a mysterious and dark mood.

title20.title: Midnight Getaway
title20.description: An atmospheric and chill cinematic track perfect for a late-night drive or a mysterious getaway scene.

title21.title: Rhodes & Sirens
title21.description: A cool, jazzy, and cinematic track featuring Rhodes piano and siren-like synth melodies, creating a mysterious yet chill vibe.

ds-track1.title: Rêve Lucide
ds-track1.description: Premier extrait exclusif de Dream Season.

title22.title: Super Mmg Bros (Desert)
title22.description: Un thème désertique pour une aventure ensoleillée.

title23.title: Kart 2
title23.description: La suite de la course, encore plus endiablée.

title24.title: Outlaws : West Coast
title24.description: Ambiance western sur la côte ouest.

title25.title: Mmg Snowboard (Peak 1)
title25.description: Dévalez les pentes enneigées avec ce titre.

title28.title: Spotimon (Opal Version) Diving Theme
title28.description: Explorez les profondeurs avec ce thème aquatique.

title29.title: Spotimon (Opal Version) Cave Theme
title29.description: Un thème mystérieux pour les grottes sombres.
